object.name: cliente
object.property: <model xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" name="bairro" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Bairro</title> </field> <field name="cidade" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Cidade</title> </field> <field name="uf" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>UF</title> <values/> </field> <field name="cep"
